About Me

Hi! I'm Peter, an Instructional Designer with a background in technical writing and web development.

My Background

Iâ€™m an Instructional Designer who fell into this field by accident but loved it immediately when I learned how it was a perfect mix of everything I enjoyed most from my previous positions.

As an onboarding specialist at a law firm, I found it very rewarding training new hires and watching them grow from feeling overwhelmed to competent in just a few weeks.

As a result, I transitioned into an Instructional Design position at AllenComm, an elearning vendor in Salt Lake City. While there, I received a promotion within my first six months as a result of my work ethic and meticulous attention to detail. I led a team that created over 70 courses while maintaining a faster pace of production than our clients were accustomed to.

I enjoyed the recent opportunity of starting Integrity First Lending's Learning and Development team, and made a significant impact on their training methods, hiring process, and company culture.

I'm currently seeking a new opportunity to make an impact as an Instructional Designer.
